title: I still dislike the new Skarner
body: I can't be the only one who thinks he's less fun after the changes.

well yea, playing around the pillars is somewhat forced/odd...also, still missing the good old ap-skarner top.

I have to admit, I like him a bit more now. Before, he was just kinda... generic. You didn't really pick him for a reason other than you wanted to. He didn't have a way to stick out. Now he does. Now he has a unique niche, and he excels at it.
What do you pick him for? His ult? you did that before too.

Now, or before?
Before, I'll admit, I picked him when I was bored. His ult was nice, aye, but no reason to have it over WW's or Vi's ult, as the rest of their kits were better than Skarner's.
Now, I occasionally pick him as an anti-Devo jungler, of sorts. He lets me contest objectives easily, since it's extremely hard to duel a Skarner in his zone of control. The ult is a nice bonus, aye, but it's more of a secondary perk to his area of influence.
Does he actually play very differently? My impression was he's roughly the same except with an instant stun and pylons
It's not that he plays differently, he just feels overall slower outside the gimmicky spires and I find him boring, a lot more than before

dpends to what iteration you compare him.
I think he's a bit more fun(though still far from great) than he was after the first two rework atempts, but he's far from original Skarner

hes boring as fuck to play

No, I agree with you OP.  He didn't need either of his reworks and I cried when they changed him.  He has been and will always be a pretty underpicked niche champ only used by a handful of die-hard fans... and riot did all they could to upset those fans and chase them away.

Then they did it again a little later with {{champion:69}} .  Still underplayed.  Still underpowered.  Her fans hated that rework.

Then they did it AGAIN with {{champion:82}} .  He's a problem right now, but so were Cass and Skarner immediately after their reworks.  Soon he'll be nerfed and he'll be underplayed and underpowered again with the only change coming about from his rework being that the old Morde fans lost a champ they liked to play in a misguided attempt to appeal to the average player.

The average player spams whatever is flavor of the month for being OP.  Stop trying to appeal to these people!  They only care about picking the champs that the meta/the pro steamers/the LCS has picked FOR them and then trying to ride those champs to easy wins.  Please stop destroying the champs people love to appeal to those people Riot.  Cass, Morde and Skarner were NOT causing problems.  They didn't have insane winrates... either high OR low.  They didn't need to be gutted and stitched back together wrong.

I haven't had much of an opportunity to play him but I like that he has actual scaling instead of trying to make a 150 base damage q and a 500 flat hp shield work for the whole game. Front loaded stun is nice too.
He is way less fun now. I used to love him, but now I don't even play him anymore.
I really used to like playing Skarner, I even have his Guardian of the sands skin. but now, I just don't feel like he's fun to play anymore. It sucks, I really liked playing skarner
Isn't he like... exactly the same but with better mana costs and cool mini objectives? WTH?
His Q feels slow and almost not worth it to use(from my impression) , the "minigame" is just a gimmick and outside the spires he's weak, whereas he's almost insanely strong in it.
At the very least can they remove that spire gimmick or make his q more fun? They moved his entire kit to his most boring ability, his e.
The same can be said to Darius. It just seems like Riot won't give 2 flying cents about it.
It doesn't matter. Far less people played Skarner than Mordekaiser, and Riot is denying that he exists right now. There is no way in hell they're changing him anytime in the next 80 years
